history.proof: intros n. induction n. - intros x Hx. hauto l: on depth: 3. - intros x Hx. hauto l: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros n. induction n. - intros x Hx. apply Hx. - intros x Hx. right. split. + apply Lindenbaum_included_n_m with (m := S n). apply Le.le_n_S, Le.le_refl. + apply Hx.
